titleInfo.title: Crossing the blvd : strangers, neighbors, aliens in a new America

mods.note: "Based on interviews with participants in the crossing the blvd project."
mods.abstract: A collection of first-person narratives and anecdotes, close-up portrait photographs, and the author's personal and historical reflections capture the rich ethnic diversity of the people and landscapes of the borough of Queens in New York City.

titleInfo.title: Rockefeller Foundation, Projects Accession number: 2012:073 Box: R3970 Folder 2001 cc 188 (A12)2001 CC 188 (A12) R3970
